title: Ghostbusters
brief_description: Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis star as the freelance crusaders who team up as the Ghostbusters Squad. Armed with ectoplasmic swats and patented booby traps, they walk a fine line between scientific genius and lunacy in their quest to rid the city of slimy, haunting monsters on the rampage in New York.
